description:
This workshop was recorded live. Some live elements have been cut out for your enjoyment. Be sure to make use of the timestamps below. Enjoy!

0:00 Introduction and Setting up AstraDB 
10:51 Indexing in Distributed Systems 
15:02 Secondary Indexing in Cassandra 
23:25 Secondary Attached Indexes 
39:14 Hands-on Exercise: Getting Started with SAI 
53:34 Question Time 
1:18:03 Hands-on Exercise: IOT Sensor Data Models 
1:30:59 Wrap-up and Resources
